name: Shuffleboard
overview: The score is tied at 32 each. It's your last chance to win the game. You approach your puck with caution. You carefully position it and strategically slide it across the board. Your opponent watches with envy as your puck crashes into his and sends it flying off the board. SHUFFLEBOARD is an action-packed entertainment pro- gram. Arcade sounds and graphics enhance the playing quality. Strategy and logic are required to win.
